sentences.sContent: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.sCn: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.sContent: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.sContent_eng: What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.sCn: 琼斯和她的同事们希望弄明白，是否一只幸福的母鸡确实产出更好的产品。
